title: Clash of the Time Trial Titans: Remco Evenepoel Prepares to Topple Pogačar And Make His Dreams Come True
content:
‘There will be five seconds between Evenepoel and Pogačar’: contenders and their teams talk confidence, homework and tech marginal gains ahead of 25km time trial.

Read the full article at Clash of the Time Trial Titans: Remco Evenepoel Prepares to Topple Pogačar And Make His Dreams Come True on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
